name: In re John Edward HASAY, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 11-3-01. Appeal of JUDICIAL CONDUCT BOARD

parties: In re John Edward HASAY, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 11-3-01. Appeal of JUDICIAL CONDUCT BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of DECEMBER, 1995, the appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 882
In re John Edward HASAY, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 11-3-01. Appeal of JUDICIAL CONDUCT BOARD.
